titleInfo.title: Sketch of subdivision of lots nos. 3, 4 & 6 corner of Main and Railway Streets in the late James Milles' [Mills] survey

physicalDescription.note: 1 map ; sheet 27 x 33 cm. Map lined with archival paper on verso. Large tear extending vertically near the right edge.

mods.note: Manuscript map. "J. D. McKay & Co." faintly handwritten near lower edge. Scale "50 ft = 1 inch". North arrow is oriented down. Streets appearing on map are Main Street and Railway Street [now Locke Street], alongside 6 numbered lots. "No 41" is handwritten in the top left corner.
